abstract: News Analysis; Pres Obama has been vigorously defending his executive authority on domestic issues, while also trying to reduce his powers to make war, to disapproval of Congressional Republicans; unusual aspect of debate over presidential power emphasizes changing political environment in Washington in era of widespread mistrust.
lead_paragraph: This week, President Obama and Republicans have swung between advocating a muscular assertion of executive authority and seeking to circumscribe it.

headline.main: Assessing the Balance of Power in an Era of Widespread Mistrust
headline.print_headline: Assessing the Balance of Power in an Era of Widespread Mistrust

snippet: This week, President Obama and Republicans have swung between advocating a muscular assertion of executive authority and seeking to circumscribe it.
